alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 2:43PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hidalgo County through 315 PM MDT... At 243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Cloverdale, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloverdale, Geronimo Pass and Skeleton Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
